channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Labour says Farage would revive austerity as he prepares to set out economic vision in speech – UK politics live
item.description: Reform UK leader expected to promise deregulation and spending cuts as Labour and Conservatives attack policies Farage is speaking now. He says anothe...

item.title: At least 36,000 Sudanese have fled since fall of El Fasher to RSF, says UN agency
item.description: International Organization for Migration says refugees are heading to Tawila, which is already sheltering 652,000 displaced people More than 36,000 Su...

item.title: ‘I can’t go on anymore’: Mazón resigns as Valencia leader and acknowledges mistakes during deadly 2024 floods – Europe live
item.description: Mazón faced daily calls for his resignation after flooding in October 2024 killed 229 people Separately, a platform representing victims of the floods...

item.title: US government shutdown nearing record for longest in history as Trump delays food benefits to millions – US politics live
item.description: Republicans claim US president ‘desperate’ to end shutdown, which has now entered 33rd day As we mentioned in the opening summary , two federal judges...

item.title: Man due in court after mass stabbing on train in Cambridgeshire
item.description: Suspect charged with attempted murder after incident on Doncaster to London King’s Cross service A man is to appear in court charged with attempted mu...

item.title: Rail security to be reviewed after train stabbings
item.description: Transport Secretary Heidi Alexander says there could be more facial recognition CCTV after a mass stabbing on a train.

item.title: Pregnant British teen freed from Georgia jail after drug smuggling charge
item.description: The 19-year-old from Teesside, who was charged with drug trafficking, is eight months pregnant.

item.title: I don't see streaming as the competition, says Vue cinema boss
item.description: Tim Richards said the likes of Netflix and Apple TV are complementary rather than damaging for the big screen.

item.title: Australian mushroom murderer appeals against convictions
item.description: Erin Patterson is serving a life sentence for killing three relatives with a toxic mushroom meal.

item.title: Israeli military's ex-top lawyer arrested as scandal over video leak deepens
item.description: Maj Gen Yifat Tomer-Yerushalmi resigned on Friday, admitting leaking the video allegedly showing abuse of a Palestinian detainee.
